description: This is the first 0.5 credit course in a two course sequence that is part of the Engineering Fellows experience. Students engage in a team-based engineering design project alongside a domain expert within the St. Olaf Community. Students also participate in professional development activities in preparation for continuing in the field of engineering and engage in a community based activity to support youth interest in engineering. Open only to juniors and seniors. Prerequisites: PHYS 130 and PHYS 131 (or PHYS 124, PHYS 125 and CSCI 121 or CSCI 125); PHYS 160 or permission of the instructor.
name: Engineering Fellows I
prerequisites: Prerequisites: PHYS 130 and PHYS 131 (or PHYS 124, PHYS 125 and CSCI 121 or CSCI 125); PHYS 160 or permission of the instructor.
